name: Monkeyrama
description:
Monkeys + Explosions + Bananas = ?
112 levels of action with lots of different physics based puzzles and Challenge Modes!

*****
WHAT'S IT MADE OF?
- 4 unique Monkey types!
- 4 beautiful episodes!
- 112 hand-crafted levels!
- Challenge modes!
- Leaderboards and achievements!
- 3 extra Bomb Monkeys if you get stuck on a level!
